```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggfortify)

relevantData <- housePrices_imputed %>%
                  filter(Neighborhood == "BrkSide" | Neighborhood == "Edwards" | Neighborhood == "NAmes")

```


```{r summary, echo=FALSE}

baseModel <- lm(SalePrice ~ GrLivArea + Neighborhood + GrLivArea*Neighborhood ,data = relevantData[-c(339,169,131),])
newModel <- lm(SalePrice ~ GrLivArea + Neighborhood + GrLivArea*Neighborhood, data = relevantData[-c(339,169,131,188,236,369),])
autoplot(baseModel, which = 1:6)
```
